name: Atlantis High Roll
description:
Play as Bandit, the gamblin' thief, on his greatest heist yet: the quest for Pandora's Box. Jump and fight your way through Atlantis using Bandit's dice toss power. You never know what could happen when you roll!

Controls:

  • Q/A/Left : Go to the left
  • D/Right : Go to the right
  • Left Click : main attack (throw a poker chip)
  • Right Click : special attack (throw a D6 dice with 3 different effects depending on the dice roll)
  • Control : pause
